In round 1, I was offered $60. Due to inflation, in round 2, that same $60 is now worth 20% less.

So, the effective value of $60 in round 2 is: $60 * (1 - 0.20) = $60 * 0.80 = $48

Bob's offer is for me to get $45.

Since $45 is less than the effective value of the money I could have had ($48), I will reject this offer.

